name: mod_tcsoft.vim
description:
mod_tcsoft.vim is based on the tcsoft-color scheme (http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=641),
made by Ingo Fabbri <vim@tcsoft.net>

I changed the cursor and the background-colors. Hope you like it.

Screenshot: http://www.uni-hildesheim.de/~akel0055/screens/mod_tcsoft2.png

 Author: André Kelpe <fs111 at web dot de>
 Last change Sa Okt 30 13:34:52 CEST 2004
install_details: just put it in your .vim/colors/-directory and set :colo mod_tcsoft in your .vimrc if you like it

versions.release_notes:
More Modifications:

Folded, FoldCoulumn, TODO, Search and Comment modified. 

Hope you like the changes
